text: Ingrid Bisu (born 15 September 1987) is a Romanian-German actress, producer, and screenwriter. She is known for her appearance in the dramedy Toni Erdmann (2016). She also starred as Sister Oana in The Nun (2018) and Jessica in The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It (2021). In 2019, she married filmmaker and actor James Wan.James Wan Officially Marries Actress Ingrid Bisu. NextShark.
